meanings.sent1: She was neglecting her plants, so they withered away.
meanings.sent2: The owner was neglecting the old building, allowing it to fall into disrepair.
meanings.sent3: The forgetful gardener kept neglecting the watering can, causing a mini drought in the garden.
meanings.sent4: Neglecting the car's maintenance is like ignoring a ticking time bomb.
meanings.sent5: Neglecting your responsibilities is like planting seeds of chaos.

meanings.definition: Pay little or no attention to; disregard.
meanings.sent1: He was neglecting his homework, choosing to play video games instead.
meanings.sent2: The teacher noticed the student neglecting the instructions given for the assignment.
meanings.sent3: The cat pretended to be neglecting the mouse, waiting for the perfect moment to pounce.
meanings.sent4: Neglecting the warning signs is like walking blindfolded into danger.
meanings.sent5: Neglecting safety precautions is like inviting trouble to knock on your door.
